short_summary: Office furniture delivery for 123 individual pieces.
description: Height adjustable table and work surface
full_summary:
**Procurement Notice**
---------------

**Government of Canada Tender Notice**
--------------------------------------

**Request for Proposal (RFP) ID**
-------------------------------

R-141296

**Tender Title**
-----------------

Height Adjustable Tables - Supply and Delivery

**Overview**
------------

The Government of Canada is seeking proposals from interested suppliers for the supply and delivery of height adjustable tables. As per this Request for Proposal (RFP), the procuring authority seeks to acquire the following:

* 123 quantities of individual height adjustable tables (base only)
* 455 quantities of individual height adjustable work surfaces measuring 30 inches x 60 inches

**Key Procurement Requirements**
--------------------------------

* Contract Type: Supply and Delivery
* Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal

**Important Details**
---------------------

* Tender Closing Date: April 30th, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: May 20th, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: May 26th, 2023

**Procurement Documents**
-------------------------

Please download the Procurement Notice and associated documents from the Government of Canada Electronic Tendering Service (https://buyandsell.gc.ca/).

* Procurement Notice (English)
* Procurement Notice (French)
* Additional Documents (English)
* Additional Documents (French)

**Contact Information**
----------------------

If you have any questions or concerns, please contact:

Daivya Aneja
daivya.aneja2@ssc-spc.gc.ca
(343) 571-4316

**Trade Agreements**
---------------------

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* and other applicable agreements

Note: Trade agreements may be subject to change without notice.

I have reformatted the source text to make it more readable and included a brief summary of the procurement requirements and important details. Please review and let me know if you need further modifications. I can certainly suggest modifications to better fit the output size constraint if needed. Best regards. 

Also, I fixed a few minor errors in the text, for example, in the original text region section, there were multiple names and dashes that I assume were errors in the formatting. But for your reference here is where I made changes in more legible markdown format.

Example, original
 ```
